products.name: Kindle
products.description: Kindle is designed as a dedicated e-reader. Indulge your love of reading without interruptions like email alerts and push notifications.

products.name: Kindle Paperwhite
products.description: We think you'll love reading on Kindle Paperwhite, and we want you to experience it yourself. If you're not 100% satisfied, you can return it in new condition within 30 days.

products.name: Kindle Voyage
products.description: Kindle Voyage is our most advanced e-reader ever. Intuitive, simple, and refined, Kindle Voyage lets you get lost in your story.

products.name: Fire HD 6 Tablet
products.description: Our most affordable tablet ever—with fast quad-core processor, HD display, front and rear cameras, Dolby Audio, and five color choices.

products.name: Fire HD 7 Tablet
products.description: Powerful, full-featured 7-inch Fire HD tablet—fast quad-core processor, HD display, front and rear cameras, stereo speakers, and five color choices.

products.name: Fire HDX 7" Tablet
products.description: Perfect-color HDX display, plus powerful quad-core processor for fast, fluid performance and immersive entertainment.

products.name: Fire HDX 8.9 Tablet
products.description: Incredibly light large-screen tablet—with a stunning HDX display, faster 2.5 GHz quad-core processor, plus Firefly and Mayday.

products.name: Fire HD Kids Edition Tablet
products.description: All-new Fire HD 6 or Fire HD 7 tablet—with 1 year of Amazon FreeTime Unlimited, Kid-Proof Case, and a 2-year worry-free guarantee—up to $95 in savings.

products.name: Amazon Fire TV
products.description: Amazon Fire TV is a tiny box you connect to your HDTV. It's the easiest way to enjoy Netflix, Amazon Instant Video, HBO GO, YouTube.com, games, music, and more.
